donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
Main Goal and Key Immediate Objectives:
Anchoring on volunteerism contribute to the promotion of conflict resolution, peace building and support the delivery of services in Kenya.

i.	Engage volunteers and through orientation and training, instil a sense of responsibility and equip them with necessary tools to initiate reconciliation amongst their affected neighbourhoods.

ii.	Harness positive attitude in the neighbourhoods to enable reconciliation and the recovery process. 

iii.	Supplement human resource capacity for distributing food, non-food items and offering counselling services in the neighbourhoods.

iv.	Monitoring and evaluating the impact the Emergency Volunteer Scheme in Nairobi so as to inform the implementation of the scheme in other districts of Kenya.
